Title: Provides vehicular access to state parks and recreational facilities free of charge to military personnel who are residents of this state
Summary: Relates to providing vehicular access to state parks and recreational facilities free of charge to military personnel who are residents of this state.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.22, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to providing vehicular access to state parks and recreational facilities free of charge to military personnel who are residents of this state
